verses.verse: Now the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpeh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> There shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> us <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> unto <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the house of <S%H1008>God,<s%> and <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voices,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1065>sore;<s%> <S%H1419><s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there should be <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H6485>lacking<s%> in <S%H4480>Israel?<s%> <S%H3478><s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is there among <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> came not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808><s%> with the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> they had <S%H1961>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>concerning<s%> him that came not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> He shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> them <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> their <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> There is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> cut <S%H1438>off<s%> from <S%H4480>Israel<s%> <S%H3478><s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain,<s%> seeing <S%H587>we<s%> have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that we will <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them of our <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> to <S%H802>wives?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> is there of the <S%H4480>tribes<s%> <S%H7626><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> came not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from <S%H4480>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

For the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there were <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H4480>inhabitants<s%> <S%H3427><s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8033>hither<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the most <S%H4480>valiant,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H2428><s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H2945>children.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do,<s%> Ye shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that hath <S%H3045>lain<s%> <S%H4904><s%> by <S%H2145>man.<s%>

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H4480>inhabitants<s%> <S%H3427><s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgins,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> had <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with any <S%H2145>male:<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> some to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H7417>Rimmon,<s%> and to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> unto them.

And <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time;<s%> and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had saved <S%H2421>alive<s%> of the <S%H4480>women<s%> <S%H802><s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead:<s%> <S%H1568><s%> and yet <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H4672>sufficed<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> repented <S%H5162>them<s%> for <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H6556>breach<s%> in the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H4480>Benjamin?<s%> <S%H1144><s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> There must be an <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> for them that be <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> that a <S%H7626>tribe<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H4480>Israel.<s%> <S%H3478><s%>

Howbeit <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of our <S%H4480>daughters:<s%> <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H4480>yearly<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> in a place <S%H834>which<s%> is on the north <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6828><s%> of <S%H4480>Bethel,<s%> <S%H1008><s%> on the east <S%H4217>side<s%> <S%H8121><s%> of the <S%H4546>highway<s%> that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4480>Bethel<s%> <S%H1008><s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and on the <S%H4480>south<s%> <S%H5045><s%> of <S%H3829>Lebonah.<s%>
Therefore they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%>

And <S%H7200>see,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H2342>dance<s%> in <S%H4246>dances,<s%> then come ye <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H2414>catch<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us to <S%H7378>complain,<s%> that we will <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Be <S%H2603>favorable<s%> unto them for our sakes: <S%H3588>because<s%> we <S%H3947>reserved<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in the <S%H4421>war:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them at this <S%H6256>time,<s%> that ye should be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them that <S%H2342>danced,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H1497>caught:<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H1129>repaired<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7626>tribe<s%> and to his <S%H4940>family,<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
